summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2306, for the improvement of Jackson Street, from 6th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South; Maynard Avenue, 7th Avenue South, 9th Avenue South, 10th Avenue South, and 12th Avenue South, each from Jackson Street to King Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 23888 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
